MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 and LL16 postcode areas of Ruthin and Denbigh affecting properties in Rhewl, Llanrhaeadr[, Prion and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:46am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:29am on 26th January 2021.
